short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture for Fisheries and Oceans Canada in the region of Mont-Joli, Quebec.
description: This tender (No. PW-22-01014564) covers office furniture types which received a tender solicitation.
full_summary:
**Office Furniture Tender**
================================

**Procurement Reference:** 30003594
**Amendment:** 2
**Publication Date:** November 24, 2022

**Tender Status:** Expired
------------------------

Fisheries and Oceans Canada has issued a [Request for Proposal (RFP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/24/84e7c8ffc4932f9d6b589250e25296eb/30003594_-_rfp_office_seatingfinal_eng.pdf) for the acquisition of office furniture through the General Supply Arrangement (SA) **E60PQ-120001/PQ**.

**Scope:**
The procurement aims to acquire office furniture, specifically chairs, to meet the needs of Fisheries and Oceans Canada in Mont-Joli, Quebec. The desired delivery date is March 1, 2023.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Procurement Method:**
The procurement will be conducted through a competitive, selective tendering process.

**Eligibility:**
Eligible bidders must be holders of the General Supply Arrangement (SA) **E60PQ-120001/PQ** or registered on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS). New suppliers wishing to participate must first register and qualify for a SA.

**Closing Date and Time:** December 12, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
------------------------------------------

Contact Information:

Department of Fisheries and Oceans
200 Kent Street, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6
